WorkItem.Description:
windows 7x64 here:

- Ntleas disappears from the context menu after reboot, perhaps this can help solving the issue http://www.hongfire.com/forum/showthread.php/82164-Right-Click-Context-Menu-for-Applocale

- Ntleas does not work with AlphaRom crack, for example this game http://www.anime-sharing.com/forum/torrents-47/5-%5B140523%5D-%5Btinkerbell%5D-新しいフォ淑母の疼き-～人妻、未亡人の熟れた身体と甘い吐息～-%5Bh-game%5D-230342/ can not be run with Ntleas

Also a suggestion of mine is to allow the drag and drop of shortcuts to Ntleas instead of only the original EXE file.

Comments.Message:
* i'll check that thread, it should require Administrator's right to register te context menu.

anyway, Thx for reporting this issues :D
